Description:
Indicates the SAML token issuer for the associated SAML token is potentially compromised. The claims included in the token are unusual or match known attacker patterns

Author: Mark Morowczynski '@markmorow', Gloria Lee, '@gleeiamglo'
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: SAML Token Issuer Anomaly
Query: sourcetype='azure-riskdetection' eql select * from _source_ where riskeventtype = 'tokenissueranomaly'
